mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASTE_TABLE (tseq, tuseq, taction, tcomedy, tcrime, tdocumentary, tdrama, tfamily, tfantasy, tnoir, thorror, tmusical, tmystery, tromance, tsf, tsports, tthriller, twar, tcar, trabbit, tanimation, tchildren, thistory, troco, tdisaster, twuxia, twestern, thotguy, thighteen, tdomestic, tforeign) VALUES (#{tseq}, #{tuseq}, #{taction}, #{tcomedy}, #{tcrime}, #{tdocumentary}, #{tdrama}, #{tfamily}, #{tfantasy}, #{tnoir}, #{thorror}, #{tmusical}, #{tmystery}, #{tromance}, #{tsf}, #{tsports}, #{tthriller}, #{twar}, #{tcar}, #{trabbit}, #{tanimation}, #{tchildren}, #{thistory}, #{troco}, #{tdisaster}, #{twuxia}, #{twestern}, #{thotguy}, #{thighteen}, #{tdomestic}, #{tforeign})
